name: Golden Trails: The New Western Rush
name_original: Golden Trails: The New Western Rush
description:
Golden Trails: The New Western Rush is an adventure-puzzle game developed by VADZIM KAMKOU and Awem Studio. It was originally released in 2010. Awem Studio published the game.
Golden Trails: The New Western Rush is available on PC and macOS. The game is sold via App Store.
